OOC: Somebody do something to get those disgusting Terrorcons off o' Sympho=
ny, I don't want one of my first characters dead!  (Well actually, it's one=
 of the later ones if you include the chars I used to have before I left th=
e RPG and came back)  Also, I can't do much with Symphony because he's in s=
tasis lock.
OOC2:Alten, about seeing grosser things in posts, things involv=
ing parts like penises and tits and stuff is one thing, gore and violence i=
s another.  Read on, and you'll see what I mean.

::Composer/Orchestra/Skul=
lgrin/Triggerhappy/Bodicons
/Cutthroat::

       Composer looked at the dat=
apad, mumbling a few "mm'kay"'s and "got that"'s, then threw it back to Whe=
eljack.

        "Okay, I got this figured out.  So, let's get to work.  No=
w, first, we need the materials and and other things like that, do we got t=
hat stuff?" Composer asked.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
   =
   Orchestra got out of his CR Chamber.  He was healed now.  

       "That=
 feels better," he said to himself.  

       Orchestra walked around the B=
lackFortress, giving himself a tour.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~
       Skullgrin walked up to Triggerhappy, Gutclaw and Explobody.

 =
       "Let's go back to base everybody!" he suggested.

        Triggerhap=
py flew off, and Skullgrin, Explobody and Gutclaw followed behind.
~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Decapitron, Headshot and Legtrap=
 continued driving, and followed Condor to the cave where Condor, Symphony,=
 Switchblade and the Terrorcons were.

        Decapitron activated his bra=
kes.  Headshot and Legtrap got out of Decapitron, then Decapitron transform=
ed back to robot mode, and walked into the cave with Headshot and Legtrap c=
lose behind him.

       "Terrorcons!!!  We've been given strict orders fro=
m Motormaster NOT to kill the Maximal hostage!" Decapitron shouted.

      =
  "I also highly suggest that you spare the life of that Maximal," Headshot=
 said, then nodded at Symphony,"Motormaster may have a use for him as well!=
"

        Legtrap tried shoving the Terrorcons out of the way, then trappe=
d Symphony's body in a net.  He then dragged the ripped up Maximal in its n=
et over to where Switchblade and Condor were.  

       Decapitron and Head=
shot walked over there as well.

       "As you said, let's keep this Maxim=
al as well for a hostage."  

       Decapitron looked back at the Terrorco=
ns.  They looked hungry.  Decapitron picked up Symphony's torn off arm, and=
 tossed it to the Terrorcons to feed on, as well as some other bits and scr=
aps of Maximal metal.

       "Chew on that," he muttered.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Cutthroat grabbed a small chunk of metal =
that had been torn from Symphony's back and scarfed it down, then he piggis=
hly started tearing at Symphony's ripped off arm.
